title: Jade Cocoon - Story of the Tamamayu
description:
JADE COCOON ?
STORY OF THE TAMAMAYU

=====================================================
Developer(s) 		Genki
=====================================================
Publisher(s)		Ubisoft
			Crave Entertainment
			Genki
=====================================================
Distributor(s) 		Genki
=====================================================
Platform(s) 		PlayStation
=====================================================
Release Date		1998-12-03 (Japan)
			1999-07-29 (North America)
			2001-04-27 (Europe)
=====================================================
Genre			RPG
=====================================================
Mode			Single Player / Multi-player
=====================================================
Rating(s)ESRB		ESRB Teen (13+)
=====================================================
I played this game roughly around the time it came out in North America and it was absolutely stunning.  Voice acting was still sort of a new thing for games, and I was surprised to find that all major dialogue, if not all, was voice acted in a way that would live up to today&#039;s standards.

The controls are similar to Resident Evil or Silent Hill, which annoys me a lot but you get used to it.  The idea that you could merge monsters and actually have them change appearance was revolutionary for it&#039;s time, especially on a platform like the 32-bit playstation.

The game can be very long or very short, depending on how you want to play it.  I always made an effort to build up my minions as strong as they could be.  And damn they look cool.

A very cool, underated game that&#039;s incredibly hard to find nowadays, even on torrent sites.

Enjoy!
